comment: The value of an operation class abstraction. Variant of ~ ovmpt2ga which does not require ` D ` and ` x ` to be distinct. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 10-Jun-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 20-Dec-2013.)
